MLFilter.name: MLFilter
MLFilter.description: Represents a data filter based on a data comparison in a machine learning (ML) application. For each comparison, thereâ€™s a left-hand element, an operator, and a right-hand element.

LhFilterId.description: ID of the left-hand filter condition.

LhType.description: Indicates the value type if a left-hand value is specified. Valid values are:

LhUnit.description: Indicates the unit if a left-hand filter is specified. Valid values are:

Operation.description: Specifies how to filter the data. Valid values are:

ParentDefinitionId.description: The ID of the MLRecommendationDefinition, MLPredictionDefinition, or MLDataDefinition that this MLFilter belongs to.

RhFilterId.description: ID of the right-hand filter condition.

RhType.description: Indicates the value type if a right-hand value is specified. Valid values are:

RhUnit.description: Indicates the unit if a right-hand filter is specified. Valid values are:

SortOrder.description: Specifies the order of operations for evaluating the expressions. For example, if you have two conditions, this field specifies which condition is evaluated first.
